long_description: The Patagonia Better Sweater has updated styling that combines the aesthetic of a knitted, striped sweater with the easy care of polyester fleece. A fully functional, get-down-and-dirty hoodie that will also get you a seat at the adult table! Combines the durability and easy care of heavyweight 100% polyester with a sophisticated sweater-knit weave and heathered, overdyed yarns. Contrast raglan sleeves and updated style lines add to the big-boy handsomeness. Cool-weather comforts include a full-length zipper with garage and internal windflap. Stand-up collar is built into the 3-panel hood. Polyester brushed jersey trim on inside of hood, zipper welts, and inside hem and sleeves. Left-chest zip pocket and cozy zippered handwarmer pockets stow your digital camera, phone and audio devices. Patagonia Better Sweater has a regular fit.
short_description: The Patagonia Better Sweater has updated styling that combines the aesthetic of a knitted, striped sweater with the easy care of polyester fleece.
